Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This unique offering comes with unparalleled features and benefits that we believe could significantly enhance your experience or business operations. Given its exceptional quality and versatility, I would like to extend an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire it at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially bringing this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
